← My Tivo Thinks I'm Gay

My Tivo Thinks I'm Gay My supervisor mentioned this article when discussing the direction of my dissertation (part of which is looking into the scrutability of personalisation assumptions).

I've never used Tivo but Amazon makes the same sort of assumptions. It's amusing to read about people trying to convince Tivo of something by recording things they aren't necessarily interested in.
